description: Try our easy to follow Tomato Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tomato Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon tomato mixture over toast, scatter with feta and pomegranate arils. Drizzle with pomegranate juice and a little extra oil to serve.
Spoon tomato mixture over toast, scatter with feta and pomegranate arils. Drizzle with pomegranate juice and a little extra oil to serve.
